ComicInfo.Title: The Power and the Portal!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Power and the Portal!: Planetary Brigade is kind of like a prequel to the series Hero Squared, in that it takes place before the latter. The Third Eye detects that a person is unwittingly a portal to multiple dimensions, bringing many many nasty creatures to earth, and it's up to the Planetary Brigade to stop it!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 04:36:27. [Issue ID 289488]
ComicInfo.Characters: Grim Knight,Captain Valor,Pussycat,The Mauve Visitor,Mr. Brilliant,Earth Goddess,The Third Eye
